titles.ar: باب الرَّجُلِ يَرْمِي الصَّيْدَ فَيُصِيبُهُ فَيَقَعُ فِي مَاءٍ أَوْ يَتَدَهْدَهُ مِنْ جَبَلٍ
titles.en: Chapter 8 – The man shoots at the hunted prey, so he hits it, so it falls into the water or it tumbles down from the mountain

titles.ar: باب الرَّجُلِ يَرْمِي الصَّيْدَ فَيُصِيبُهُ فَيَقَعُ فِي مَاءٍ أَوْ يَتَدَهْدَهُ مِنْ جَبَلٍ
titles.en: Chapter 8 – The man shoots at the hunted prey, so he hits it, so it falls into the water or it tumbles down from the mountain

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: مجهول - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (1/354)
text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عِيسَى عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عِيسَى عَنْ حَجَّاجٍ عَنْ خَالِدِ بْنِ الْحَجَّاجِ عَنْ أَبِي الْحَسَنِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ لَا تَأْكُلْ مِنَ الصَّيْدِ إِذَا وَقَعَ فِي الْمَاءِ فَمَاتَ .

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad Bin Isa, from Muhammad Bin Isa, from Hajjaj, from Khalid Bin Al Hajjaj,
Abu Al-Hassan<sup>asws</sup> has said: ‘Do not eat from the hunted prey which falls into the water, so it dies’.
en.sarwar: 1. Muhammad ibn Yahya has narrated from Ahmad ibn ‘Isa from Muhammad ibn ‘Isa from Hajjaj from Khalid ibn al-Hajj aj who has said the following: “Abu al-Hassan, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, has said, ‘Do not eat the prey that falls in water and dies.’”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: موثق - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (1/355)
text: عِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَصْحَابِنَا عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ خَالِدٍ عَنْ عُثْمَانَ بْنِ عِيسَى عَنْ سَمَاعَةَ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) أَنَّهُ سُئِلَ عَنْ رَجُلٍ رَمَى صَيْداً وَ هُوَ عَلَى جَبَلٍ أَوْ حَائِطٍ فَيَخْرِقُ فِيهِ السَّهْمُ فَيَمُوتُ فَقَالَ كُلْ مِنْهُ وَ إِنْ وَقَعَ فِي الْمَاءِ مِنْ رَمْيَتِكَ فَمَاتَ فَلَا تَأْكُلْ مِنْهُ .

en.hubeali: A number of our companions, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad Bin Khalid, from usman Bin Isa, from Sama’at,

(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> having been asked about a man who shot as a prey, and he was upon a mountain, or a wall, so the arrow pierced into it, so it died’. So he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘Eat from it, and if it falls into the water from it being shot, so it dies, so do not eat from it’.
en.sarwar: 2. A number of our people have narrated from Ahmad ibn Muhammad ibn Khalid from ‘Uthman ibn ‘Isa from Sama‘ah who has said the following: “Once abu ‘Abd Allah, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, was asked about the case of a man who shoots a prey on a mountain or wall. The arrow pierces into it and it dies. He (the Imam) said, ‘You can use it for food; but if it falls in water and dies, then do not eat it. 5 ” Ali ibn Ibrahim has narrated from his father from ibn abu ‘Umayr from Hammad from al-Halabiy from ‘Abd Allah ‘Alayhi al-Salam, has narrated a similar Hadith. Muhammad ibn Yahya has narrated from Ahmad ibn Muhammad from certain persons of our people from Hisham ibn Salim from Sama‘ah from ‘Abd Allah, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, has narrated a similar Hadith.

text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنِ ابْنِ عُمَيْرٍ عَنْ حَمَّادٍ عَنِ الْحَلَبِيِّ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) مِثْلَهُ
مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ بَعْضِ أَصْحَابِنَا عَنْ هِشَامِ بْنِ سَالِمٍ عَنْ سَمَاعَةَ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) مِثْلَهُ .

en.hubeali: Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, from Ibn Umeyr, from Hammad, from Al Halby,
(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> – similar to it.
Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from one of our companoins, from Hisham Bin Salim, from Sama’at,
(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> – similar to it.
